briefdescription.para: Signal emitted when the selected nodes have changed.
Internal function triggered when any change is signalled from the QGraphicsScene.

detaileddescription.para: Current primary function is to inform all NodeViewEdges to re-adjust in case any Nodes have moved

briefdescription.para: Receiver for when the scene's selected items change.
Receiver for when the user right clicks (or otherwise requests a context menu)
Receiver for when the user requests a new node from the add menu.
Receiver for setting the direction from the context menu.
Receiver for auto-position descendents menu action.
Receiver for labelling a node from the context menu.
A widget for viewing and editing node graphs.

detaileddescription.para: This widget takes a NodeGraph object and constructs a QGraphicsScene representing its data, viewing and allowing the user to make modifications to it.
